home.bio: Software Engineer with ten years of experience in developing modern and innovative software solutions. Strong knowledge in Java, C++, TypeScript/JavaScript, as well as experience with cloud platforms (AWS, Firebase) and frameworks (Spring, Expo, Next.js).

skills.title: Skills
skills.subtitle: Technologies and tools I work with

projects.title: Projects
projects.subtitle: Some of the projects I've worked on

iga.title: Identity Governance & Administration (IGA)
iga.description: Development of an authorization management system with integrated API interfaces and specialized adapters.

dpa-import.title: News Import for dpa
dpa-import.description: Development of a system for processing dpa news data with complex business logic-driven processing.

news-processing.title: News Data Processing
news-processing.description: System for importing, exporting, and processing news data with complex business logic.

autocad-modeling.title: AutoCAD Modeling in CABD Workflow
autocad-modeling.description: Development of a UI for CAD modeling in the CABD workflow with advanced 3D visualization features.

distributor.title: Distribution Line in CABD Workflow
distributor.description: Development and implementation of a module for creating path geometries and distribution lines in Computer Aided Bridge Design (CABD). The project included complex geometry calculations, parameterized path creation, and seamless integration into the SOFiSTiK environment for bridge and structural design.

automated-testing.title: Automated GUI Testing
automated-testing.description: Development of an automated test suite for GUI applications with integration into CI/CD pipelines.

cicd-web.title: CI/CD for Web Components
cicd-web.description: Development of a CI/CD pipeline for web components with automated tests and build processes.

bakkal-usta.title: Platform App "Bakkal-Usta"
bakkal-usta.description: Development of a mobile platform app with a focus on user-friendly design and seamless backend integration.
